sittað her oð þæt ic me gebidde.
WSCp MARK 14.33 And he nam þa mid him Petrum & Iacobum & Iohannem;
þa ongan he forhtian & sargian. WSCp MARK 14.34 & sæde him,
unrot is min sawl oð deað;
Gebidað her & waciað.
WSCp MARK 14.35 Ða he lythwon forðstop, he astrehte hine ofer þa eorðan
& he bæd gif hit beon mihte þæt he on þære tide fram him gewite.
WSCp MARK 14.36 And þa cwæð he,
Abba, þæt is fæder on ure geþeode, ealle þing þe synt mihtiglice;
Afyrr þysne calic fram me,
ac na þæt ic wylle ac þæt þu.
WSCp MARK 14.37 Þa com he & funde hi slæpende; & cwæð to Petre,
Simon, slæpst þu;
Ne mihtest ðu ane tide wacian?
WSCp MARK 14.38 Waciað & gebiddað þæt ge on costnunge ne gan;
Witodlice se gast is gearu
ac þæt flæsc is untrum.
WSCp MARK 14.39 And eft he gebæd þa ylcan spræce.
WSCp MARK 14.40 & þa he hine eft agen bewende, he funde hi slæpende;
Hyra eagan wæron gehefegode
& hi nyston hwæt hi him andswaredon.
WSCp MARK 14.41 Ða com he þriddan siðe & sæde him,
slapað nu & restað;
Genoh hit ys;
Tima ys cumen
nu is mannes sunu geseald on synfulra handa.
WSCp MARK 14.42 Arisaþ,
uton gan;
Nu is gehende se ðe me sylð.
WSCp MARK 14.43 Him þa ða gyt sprecendum com Iudas Scarioth, þæt ys, wiþersaca, an of þam twelfum, & mid him mycel menegeo mid swurdum & mid sahlum fram heahsacerdum, bocerum & ealdrum.
WSCp MARK 14.44 Soðlice his læwa him tacen sealde & þus cwæð,
swa hwylcne swa ic cysse he hit is;
Nimað & lædað hine wærlice.
WSCp MARK 14.45 & sona swa he com he genealæhte him to & cwæð, Lareow, & cyste hine.
WSCp MARK 14.46 & hi hyra handa on hine wurpon & namon hine.
WSCp MARK 14.47 Soðlice an of þam þe ðar embeuton stodon his swurde abræd & sloh þæs sacerdes þeow & his eare of acearf.
WSCp MARK 14.48 Þa cwæð se hælend him andswariende,
swa swa to anum sceaðan ge ferdon mid swurdon & treowum me gefon.
WSCp MARK 14.49 Þonne ic dæghwamlice mid eow wæs on temple lærende
& ge me ne namon,
ac þæt þa gewritu syn gefyllede.
WSCp MARK 14.50 Ða forleton his leorningcnihtas ealle hine & flugon.
WSCp MARK 14.51 Sum iungling him fyligde mid anre scytan bewæfed nacod
& hi namon hine.
WSCp MARK 14.52 Ða aworpenre þære scytan nacod he him fram fleah.
WSCp MARK 14.53 And hi læddon þæne hælend to þam heahsacerde,
& comon ealle sacerdas & boceras & ealdras togædere.
WSCp MARK 14.54 Petrus him fyligde feorran oþ ðæs heahsacerdes cafertun,
& he sæt mid þam ðenum & wyrmde hine æt þam fyre.
WSCp MARK 14.55 Þa heahsacerdas sohton & eall geþeaht tale agen þone hælend þæt hi hine to deaðe sealdon
& hi ne fundon.
WSCp MARK 14.56 Manega sædon lease gecyðnysse agen hine
& þa cyðnessa næron þæslice.
WSCp MARK 14.57 Ða arison sume & sædon lease cyðnesse agen hine & þus sædon.
WSCp MARK 14.58 Soðes we gehyrdon hine secgan,
ic towurpe þis handworhte tempel
& æfter þrim dagum ic oðer unhandworht getimbrie.
WSCp MARK 14.59 & hyra cyþnys næs þæslic.
WSCp MARK 14.60 Þa aras sum heahsacerd on hyra midlene & ahsode þæne hælend,
ne andswarast þu nan ðing agen þæt þas þe onwurpað?
WSCp MARK 14.61 He suwode & naht ne andswarode;
Eft hine axode se heahsacerd,
eart þu Crist, þæs gebletsodan Godes sunu?
WSCp MARK 14.62 Ða sæde se hælend,
ic eom,
& ge geseoð mannes sunu on swyðran healfe sittan his mægenes & cumende mid heofones genipum.
WSCp MARK 14.63 Þa cwæð se heahsacerd his reaf slitende,
hwi gewilnige we gyt cyðera?
WSCp MARK 14.64 Ge gehyrdon his bysmer;
Hwæt þincð eow;
ða hyrwdon hi ealle hine & cwædon þæt he wære deaðes scyldig.
WSCp MARK 14.65 And sume agunnon him on spætan & oferwreon his ansyne & mid fystum hine beoton & him to cwædon,
aræd;
And þa ðenas hine mid handum beoton.
WSCp MARK 14.66 And þa Petrus wæs on cafertune þa com to him an þinen þæs heahsacerdes.
WSCp MARK 14.67 & þa heo geseah Petrum wyrmende þa cwæð heo,
þu wære mid ðam Nazareniscan hælende.
WSCp MARK 14.68 Ða ætsoc he & cwæð,
ic nat; Ne ne can hwæt þu segst;
And he eode þa of þam cafertune
& se hana creow.
WSCp MARK 14.69 Eft þa hine gecneow oðer þinen;
